# Qwizzeria

> Turn any gathering into a smart game night.

Qwizzeria is a web-based quiz platform for playing, hosting, and competing in beautifully designed quizzes.

## Pages

- / — Landing page with links to play, browse packs, and view leaderboard
- /play/free — Play a free quiz with random questions in a Jeopardy-style grid (public, no login required)
- /packs — Browse curated quiz packs by category (login required)
- /leaderboard — Global leaderboard with time filters (all time, this month, this week)
- /guide — How to Play guide covering Standard and Tournament modes
- /dashboard — User dashboard with quick actions and resumable sessions (login required)
- /profile — User profile, display name, stats, and account settings (login required)
- /history — Paginated session history with expandable question details (login required)
- /host — Host a live multiplayer quiz: pack select → setup → grid → score → results (login required)

## Features

- Free Quiz: Jeopardy-style grid with random questions — no login required
- Quiz Packs: Curated question sets with Jeopardy or Sequential play modes
- Host Mode: Live multiplayer quiz hosting with countdown timer and live scoreboard (2–8 players)
- Tournament Mode: Auto-generated single-elimination bracket for 2–16 players
- Leaderboard: Global and per-pack rankings with time-based filters
- Premium Packs: Unlocked for Patreon supporters
- Resume Sessions: In-progress quizzes saved and resumable from the dashboard
